page.title: 01INTRODUCTION I
page.content: INTRODUCTION ------------- THE AREA COVERING THE VILLAGES OF SWANTON ABBOTT,SKEYTON,SCOTTOW AND WESTWICK IS MAINLY AGRICULTURAL,THE LARGER FARMS AND ESTATES STILL PROVIDING EMPLOYMENT FOR MANY OF THE INHABITANTS.MANY NEW HOUSES HAVE BEEN BUILT IN THE AREA IN THE LAST 15-20 YEARS,ESPECIALLY IN SWANTON ABBOTT.FOR A LARGER SELECTION OF SHOPS ONE HAS TO GO TO NORTH WALSHAM OR TO NORWICH SOME TWELVE MILES AWAY.A WEEKLY BUS RUNS FROM SWANTON ABBOTT & SKEYTON TO NTH.WALSHAM ON THURSDAY FOR MARKET DAY.BEING SITUATED ON THE MAIN NORWICH NTH. WALSHAM ROAD SCOTTOW & WESTWICK HAVE A MORE FREQUENT BUS SERVICE. THE COMMUNITY IS FRIENDLY AND CLOSE KNIT WITH SEVERAL VENUES FOR THOSE WITH VARYING INTERESTS.
